vsParam:
So, students of alchemy,
please start your synthesis with the given ingredients!

Although time is tight,
you must be careful!

Bergamot Sensei!
We just need to help you gather ingredients, right?

Yes, thank you.
I also need to trouble students of other disciplines.

It's alright. We must help one another in times of difficulty.
Right, guys?

Yeah! Students of relicology are all here,
I'll go summon students of other disciplines!

But, this commission is really a big deal.
It's not common to see such a big commission...

Uh... But, our teams are very coordinated.
We should be able to complete the commission smoothly.

What... is going on?
Is this group training thing common here?

No. We are now facing a big trouble,
so everyone is gathered to come up with a solution.

I can see that.
But it's incredible! Everyone in the Academy acts in unison...

Hee hee, we must help one another in times of difficulty!
We are all "partners" in the Academy!
... It's not like I don't know about it.
Mimi, how about you come and help too?
What!? Why do you bring it up...

Why... Never mind.
Got it. I'll help.

This is just for playing house, playing house as "partners"!
I'm just playing with you!

Yeah! Hee hee, thank you!
Even so, I'm still very happy!

If I am to help,
you guys must make proper things.

I'll help you check the quality of the medicine.
Show me when you are done!

But, can we make it at this speed?
We still need to make lots of medicine.
We'll be able to finish on time if we work together.

Tee hee... Ha ha ha, what are you talking about?
That's absurd!
That's right. You have faith in everyone.

You are very coordinated. I can see that.
And I must admit that you guys are very hardworking.

Uh... I said that "partners" in the Academy...
is just a bunch of "strangers". My apologies.

Uh? I'm sorry, Mimi.
What did you say?

A-anyway!
I'll go gather ingredients too!
Don't loaf on! Do you understand?

Ah, wait, Mimi!
I apologize for my behavior just now!
